reviews.review: I forget what happens in this one but its half life 2 so it was probably good
Extremely good, and a necessary part of the series, but it's extremely short. I only wish it had a side challenge like episode 2 to make it feel a little longer.
За саундтрек  отдельный + про сюжет и геймплей даже говорить не буду) Всё круто очень круто.
classic, if you enjoy valve's games in general this is a good one.
It is Half-Life 2, if you are on this platform you owe it to yourself to buy and play it.

Gayet güzel bir oyun half life 2 den sonra aldım , ve oynamaya başladım çok eylendim 6 saat te bitirdim  tadını çıkara çıkara oynadım  türkçe altyazı var oyunda türkçe desteklenmememektedir dediğine bakmayın gayet eylenceli <3 şimdi episode 2 yi almaya gidiyorum
Eu achei muito bom, pode ir na confiança.

I made walkthrough of this game three times: in 2006, in 2012 and in 2021. Still awesome.
Yes, it is bad situation, that Valve decided to split Half-Life: Aftermath into episodes.. and even worse situation that Valve forgot about HL2: Episode Three and HL2: Episode Four after 2007.
But in all other things it's a good part of the whole trilogy: HL2+EP1+EP2. I advise to play these games consequently.

Especially I like game design decisions in chapter where you and Alyx explore underground tunnels
Почему все сщитают что первый эпизод плохой он вполне себе нормальный
best story best half life 2 episode
This is a great game, it's even harder and scarier than Half-Life 2 and this game's story is crazy. This is a deffenetly one of the best Half-Life fan.
Поскольку является продолжением вселенной, однозначно рекомендую.
it was short and kinda ez but still epic
its not as good as ep2 put still really fun
Gordon Freeman: bi sus be allah belanı
Buena historia, jugabilidad, enemigos, se las recomiendo para pasar el rato y entretenerse con esta maravillosa saga
Цыганка и наш мужичок бегут по ЧАЭС и едут в другой город но что-то опять идёт не так

En lo personal pienso que, este es el juego de half life individual, que es el mas débil de todos, lo digo por que aparte de ser bastante corto comparándolo con su siguiente episodio como principal aspecto negativo (según mi opinión).

Puntos a favor:
-En mi opinión tiene la mejor ambientación de todo half-life 2, (spoiler) en especifico la parte inicial, la del núcleo y la de el tren.
-La mejora en la inteligencia artificial se nota bastante.
-hay escenas que me llagaron a sorprender y poner ansioso como (spoiler x2) la parte del núcleo, la de el choque de nuestro tren y principalmente el final.

Puntos en contra:
-su duración deja mucho que  desear.
-El final esta un poco raro (me refiero a que parece que fue una broma de parte de valve, es como el meme de y todos murieron FIN)
-Su dificultad es muy poca (creo que esto se debe al logro de solo disparar una bala)

En general es un juego bueno ... solo eso bueno.
La ambientación esta bien logrado, Hay poquísimas pantallas de carga, e introduce nuevas mecánicas, pero como ya dije es el mas débil de los 3 juegos y su corta duración, no le ayuda.

En lo personal yo compre la "orange box" (si en pleno 2021) y me pareció perfecto el precio por todos los juegos de half-life (menos el 1) pero comprando en individual no creo que sea una buena compra.


Lo recomiendo pero no al precio que tiene, lo dejo al criterio de el lector.
Gracias por leer.
Historia muito curta porém ainda é um HL.

[h1]Half-Life 2[/h1]
[h1]-Episode One-[/h1]

[b] Bom vamos lá[/b]

[b] Ele é uma continuação do ponto onde paramos no Half life 2.[/b]

[b]Conhecemos novos itens, e um novo zombie que se chama "zombine". [/b]

[b] Bem curtinho, mas interessante.[/b]

[b] Basicamente você está correndo contra o tempo para sair da cidade, já que tudo vai explodir. [/b]

[b] Roda tranquilo em qualquer computador que tenha 4 GB. [/b]

[b] Caso não tenha dinheiro suficiente para comprar agora, espere a promoção.[/b]

[b]Para entender a história de forma clara, recomendo dar uma passadinha neste guia onde explica como você pode habilitar a legenda em português no Half Life 2. [/b] 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=293351385

[b] Sem duvida, se tem interesse em completar todo enredo Half life, Vale a pena conferir. [/b]

good shit, honestly it has more story than Half Life 2 did kind of, but I'm glad they put it in after the game itself because it was kind of long as is. It was also an ok end and I really don't see how they could have incorporated this into the game.
Очень короткая прошел за 3 часа, зря отдал 200 рублей
Its pretty much just more Half life 2.  It doesn't add anything new but it doesn't have too.

the blue shift of the HL2 games.
a bit underrated. it's really well-designed, even if short. it was also a turning point for the series.

I readily admit I never much cared for the Alyx character.  There are multiple points where as a character wearing no armor that she is somehow indestructible.  After seeing so many comrades die in the main game, I just find this lacking.  She is also presented as some love interest for Freeman, but as I find her mostly annoying and a trope of everything wrong in our leftist society, I find her underwhelming.  She is featured far more than in the main game.  If you find Alyx annoying, or worse, as I do, I would skip episodes I and II and play some of the free to play mods like Downfall that remove her from the experience, a definite addition by subtraction.

Not as good as Half Life 2 but still a great game. It does a good job continuing on with Half Life 2's story and slightly builds on that game's mechanics. Even though there is a slight drop in quality, it is still 100% worth playing if you have played Half Life 2.
